name: HORDES OF HELL
description:
HORDES OF HELL is a third-person Hack’n’Slash set in a foreboding underworld. Players will face off against swarms of enemies and vicious bosses. Defeat legions of demons to use their resources to get new weapons, items and abilities. Give 'em Hell!

  • A Single Player Experience
  • Battle in a hellish fortress environment
  • Hack'n'Slash through various enemy encounters
  • Engage in combat with a variety of weapons and powers
  • Progress your way to the final boss!

HORDES OF HELL was a major project made by a group of students at the Academy of Interactive Entertainment in Sydney. It was made over the course of 4 months.
